publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2941 Mr Andrew Arbuckle on behalf of the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill Committee:Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill be passed.
S2M-2941 Mr Andrew Arbuckle on behalf of the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill Committee: Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill be passed.
